mapper.update: update orders set staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pharmacy_id = #{pharmacyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, should_money = #{shouldMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, relly_money = #{rellyMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, integral = #{integral,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, staff_id, pharmacy_id, user_id, should_money, relly_money, integral from orders
